description.message: An extension which is scheduled refresh of web pages to view the latest operation status or keep your pages signed in

startTaskTitle.message: Adds a scheduled refresh task for the current page, and modifies the configuration if it already exists

contentConfirmText.message: Stop the refresh task for this webpage?

contentAlreadylog.message: [VoltaRefresh]:A refresh task already exists, adjust the refresh interval to

refreshTypeDesc.message: If you have enabled the hibernation function of browser tabs, the default refresh will not work after the tab is hibernated. But if you don't have tab hibernation turned on, both refresh methods will work. In addition, when you choose the long-lasting refresh method, we will stop the computer from sleeping.

updateBtnTitle.message: A refresh task already exists for the current page
